titles.title: Veterans' Compensation Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 1987

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rates of disability compensation for disabled veterans and the rates of dependency and indemnity compensation for surviving spouses and children of veterans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from VA. Unfavorable.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Veterans' Compensation Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 1987 - Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to increase the rates of: (1) veterans' disability compensation; (2) additional compensation for dependents; (3) the clothing allowance for certain disabled veterans; (4) dependency and indemnity compensation for surviving spouses and for children of veterans; and (5) supplemental dependency and indemnity compensation for children of veterans.
